citation.article-title: Reclassification of the genus Leuconostoc and proposals of Fructobacillus fructosus gen. nov., comb. nov., Fructobacillus durionis comb. nov., Fructobacillus ficulneus comb. nov. and Fructobacillus pseudoficulneus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Fructobacillus ficulneus comb. nov.
Fructobacillus ficulneus (fi.culâ€²ne.us. L. masc. adj. ficulneus of the fig tree).
Basonym: Leuconostoc ficulneum Antunes et al. 2002.
The description of Fructobacillus ficulneus is the same as that given for Leuconostoc ficulneum by Antunes et al. (2002).
